name: Acajoom
desc: Includes the newsletter Acajoom

name: Usergroup MI (ACL)
desc: Set the usergroup for the user account.

name: ACY Mailing
desc: Assign Users to ACY Mailign List

name: Admin-User-Access
desc: Will automate addition of a user to a Admin-User-Access group in Admin-User-Access

name: Adsmanager
desc: Publish or unpublish listings in Adsmanager component

name: Automatic Coupon
desc: Always apply a coupon on checkout for the membership plan this is applied to.

name: Automatic Discount
desc: Always grant a discount on the membership plan this is applied to. With Restrictions, this can be used for upgrade discounts between plans.

name: AEC Donate
desc: Let the user pay whatever he likes (with minimum and maximum) for a plan

name: HTML Invoice Mailout
desc: Send out a modified HTML version of the Invoice printout page

name: Customize Invoice Printout
desc: Change the Information that is displayed when printing the invoice for a plan that has this MI attached

name: Modify Cost
desc: Give the user several customized options which will modify the checkout cost

name: Modify Expiration Date
desc: Dynamically resets the Expiration Date of the subscription it is applied to

name: AEC Plan Application
desc: Apply a payment plan to a user

name: AEC Points
desc: Granting or Charging points, as well as giving the user the option to _QQ_pay_QQ_ with points (get a discount for points).

name: Tax Helper
desc: Specify tax for this item - affects Confirmation&Checkout screen, Item cost and Invoice printout

name: AEC Tip
desc: Let the user add a tip on the checkout

name: Custom User Details
desc: Request additional user details on Confirmation - stored with the user account

name: Custom User Subscription Details
desc: Request additional user details on Confirmation - stored in the subscription

name: AffiliatePRO
desc: Connect your AEC sales to AffiliatePRO

name: Age Restriction
desc: Require the user to submit a birthdate and allow checking out a plan based on that.

name: Agora Forum
desc: Change the Users Roles and Roles in Agora

name: Alpha User Points
desc: Granting or Charging points, as well as giving the user the option to _QQ_pay_QQ_ with points (get a discount for points).

name: Amigos
desc: Amigos is an Affiliate Tracking Extension for Joomla from Dioscouri.com

name: APC
desc: Manage Advanced Profile Control access groups

name: Attend Events
desc: Dummy MicroIntegration - for now only links payments from AE to AEC

name: Community Builder
desc: Actions that affect the Community Builder user account

name: Coupons
desc: Create and send out coupons

name: Directory
desc: Create Directories with this MI

name: DisplayPipeline
desc: Display Text on the AEC Module

name: DocMan
desc: Choose the amount of files a user can download and what DocMan group should be assigned to the user account

name: EasyDiscuss
desc: Change the Users Ranks and Badges in EasyDiscuss

name: Email
desc: Send an Email to one or more addresses on application or expiration of the subscription

name: Email Files
desc: Send an Email with attached files to one or more addresses on application of the subscription

name: Multiple Emails
desc: Send multiple Emails at once on application of the subscription

name: Event List
desc: Register a user for an event in the Eventlist component

name: Eventlog
desc: Make entries into the Eventlog

name: File
desc: Create and Modify files on your server

name: Fireboard Micro Integration
desc: Will automate addition of a user to a group in FireBoard

name: FLEXIaccess
desc: Set FLEXIaccess groups on application or expiration of a plan

name: Frontend-User-Access
desc: Will automate addition of a user to a Frontend-User-Access group in Frontend-User-Access

name: Google Adsense Conversion
desc: With this, you can attach Google Adsense Conversion tracking code to the DisplayPipeline.

name: Google Analytics
desc: With this, you can attach Google Analytics e-commerce tracking code to the DisplayPipeline.

name: Hot Property
desc: Create and change Agents and Companies with this MI

name: .htaccess
desc: Protect a folder with a .htaccess file and only allow users of this subscription to access it with their joomla account details.

name: HTTP Query
desc: Sends out a HTTP request to an url, including GET variables

name: iDevAffiliate
desc: Connect your sales to the iDevAffiliate Component

name: Interspire Email Marketer
desc: Sign up users to your Interspire Email Marketer lists, sync userdetails

name: iProperty
desc: Create and change Agents and Companies, as well as setting posting restrictions with this MI

name: JARC
desc: Create affililates and track payments in JARC

name: JNews
desc: Includes the newsletter JNews

name: Instant PHP Jobs! Integration
desc: Create default resume or company for the Jobs! Component, publish and unpublish resumes or companies

name: JomSocial
desc: Actions that affect the JomSocial user account

name: JomSocial-JSPT
desc: Choose the default profile type for a user.

name: Joomdle
desc: Assign Courses in Joomdle

name: Joomla Plugin
desc: Call a Joomla Plugin (only Authentication for now)

name: Joomla User
desc: Actions that affect the joomla user account

name: JUGA
desc: Set JUGA groups on application or expiration of a plan

name: K2
desc: Assign users to K2 usergroups

name: Kunena Forum
desc: Change the Users Rank in Kunena

name: Mailchimp
desc: Let users sign up to your Mailchimp lists, sync userdetails

name: MosetsTree
desc: Restrict the amount of listings a user can publish

name: Multi User Creation
desc: Create multiple users and assign subscriptions to their accounts

name: MySMS Micro Integration
desc: Will automate enable a user to send sms via MySMS, and add x credits to the account.

name: mySQL Query
desc: Specify a mySQL query that should be carried out with this subscription or on its expiration

name: Ninjaboard
desc: Assign Groups in Ninjaboard

name: Pardot Marketing
desc: Connect your users to Pardot Marketing

name: Pepperjam Tracking
desc: Connect your sales to Pepperjam

name: Phoca Download
desc: Assign Users to access rights to categories

name: PHPBB3 Integration
desc: will set the users group in phpbb on subscription/expiration

name: Raffle
desc: A very basic raffle setup

name: RedShop
desc: Choose the RedShop usergroup this user should be applied to

name: RSgallery2
desc: Create User galleries and manage gallery publication status

name: RStickets
desc: Create Tickets in RSTickets

name: Share A Sale
desc: Connect your sales to Share A Sale

name: SOBI
desc: Publish or unpublish listings in Joomla's Sigsiu Online Business Index component

name: SobiPro
desc: An MI for the SobiPro component. This is a port of Sobi2 MI adapted for use with SobiPro

name: Support Time Tracker
desc: Simple time tracker that can be used to keep track of support hours

name: Tienda
desc: Choose the Tienda usergroup this user should be applied to

name: UddeIM
desc: Choose the amount of PMs a user can send.

name: File Unpack
desc: Unpack packed files on your server

name: vBulletin Integration
desc: Will update vBulletin usergroups on subscription/expiration

name: VirtueMart
desc: Choose the VM usergroup this user should be applied to

name: Webex
desc: An MI for connecting with Webex Services

name: YourMembership.com
desc: An MI for connecting with YourMembership.com
